title: Educational Technology Integration Strategies for Teacher Training: Improving Lecture-Based Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Lecture-based instructional design and experience in applying fundamental educational technologies
context.additional_context: Enhancing educational technology integration capabilities linked to social studies in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design lectures using three or more digital tools suitable for lecture-based instruction (e.g., interactive whiteboards, real-time polling platforms).
Learners can create multimedia materials (e.g., videos, infographics) to engage students in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment and effectively integrate them into lectures.
Learners can plan and operate technology-integrated projects (e.g., virtual field trips, digital storytelling) aligned with social studies curricula using a PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
